summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Amanda Kirby and Paul regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. The email discusses scheduling a meeting for the week of October 8, 2013, to manage Epstein's accounts upon his return to New York City.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and Paul regarding account management.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as a person who will be meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the client for whom the meeting is being scheduled to discuss account management.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is mentioned as having communicated with Amanda Kirby about setting up the meeting with Epstein.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating with Paul regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Amanda Kirby is involved in managing the accounts of Jeffrey Epstein.
Harry communicated with Amanda Kirby about the meeting with Epstein.

events.title: Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A meeting is scheduled to discuss account management for Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The email discusses scheduling a meeting for the week of October 8, 2013.
Jeffrey Epstein is the client whose accounts are being managed.
Harry informed Amanda about Epstein's request for a meeting.
